name: Train Nanochat LLM
description: Train nanochat - the best ChatGPT that $100 can buy.

config.setup: git clone https://github.com/karpathy/nanochat.git ~/nanochat && cd ~/nanochat && ([ -d '.venv' ] || uv venv) && source .venv/bin/activate && uv sync --extra gpu && uv pip install transformerlab && unset CONDA_PREFIX && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && source $HOME/.cargo/env && uv run maturin develop --release --manifest-path rustbpe/Cargo.toml
